lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "It is commonplace to have trades of 100 mln dlrs or more in 10-years, seven years or five years, all related to an interest rate swap or hedging of a eurobond deal," Jones said at a recent conference on the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Within the past few months, National Westminster Bank Plc's County Bank subsidiary and Swiss Bank Corp have applied to the Federal Reserve Bank of New York to become primary dealers in U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The interesting thing our figures show is the transition in London from a marketing effort to a trading effort," said Louis Crandall, an economist at Wrightson who has been collecting the data.
